info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 3:58PM EDT until August 15 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cabarrus County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northeastern Mecklenburg County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Downtown Concord, or near University City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Downtown Concord, Northeast Charlotte, West Concord, Harrisburg, Mt Pleasant, University City, Midland, Reedy Creek Park, Charlotte Motor Speedway and Hidden Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
